p: The incubation period varied according to the severity of symptoms. Patients with mild symptoms reported the mean interval to be approximately 5 and 12 days from the beginning of infection to their first treatment and hospital care, respectively, and in patients with severe symptoms, the interval was 7 and 8 days, respectively [ 1]. The time from the manifestation of the disease to its diagnosis in critically ill patients who eventually died was observed to be considerably longer, with an average of nine days.
